Publications

2021

    Qi Yu and Anselm Fliethmann. 2021. Frame detection in German political discourses: How far can we go without large-scale manual corpus annotation?. Proceedings of 1st Workshop on Computational Linguistics for Political Text Analysis (CPSS). [PDF] [RESOURCE]

    Qi Yu, Aikaterini-Lida Kalouli and Diego Frassinelli. 2021. KonTra at CMCL 2021 Shared Task: Predicting Eye Movements by combining BERT with Surface, Linguistic and Behavioral Information. Proceeding of The 2021 Cognitive Modeling and Computational Linguistics Workshop (CMCL). [PDF]

2020

    Regine Eckardt and Qi Yu. 2020. German bloß questions as extreme ignorance questions. Linguistica Brunensia. 58, 7-22. [PDF]
